column3:
So long pruning!

utACK fa08c5cb993f07fd4309f2a6bd9ef4696f07e24c

Not that it makes any difference, but I expect feature_dbcrash takes longer to run than feature_pruning.

utACK fa08c5cb993f07fd4309f2a6bd9ef4696f07e24c\n\nI think we should make `MAX_BLOCKFILE_SIZE`, `BLOCKFILE_CHUNK_SIZE`, `UNDOFILE_CHUNK_SIZE` variable in the long run (either custom values for regtest or reducible via a debug parameter) in order to properly do functional testing for pruning.
